text: Russell Irving "Russ" Tamblyn (born December 30, 1934) is an American movie and television actor and dancer. He is best known for his performance in title role of the 1958 Tom Thumb and the 1961 movie musical West Side Story as Riff, the leader of the Jets gang. ==Other websites== * * * NNDB page Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles
title: Russ Tamblyn
